post:
I will be bringing on a node in Hamilton ON this evening and need some testers.

You will be provided with a VPS with the following:

1 CPU Core
3GB of RAM
50GB of Storage
100Mbit Port
1IP

If you'd like to give it a go and report your findings to me, I would really appreciate it. I'd like you to test it out for the day and let me know how it performs.

We will be offering this location shortly assuming everything goes according to plan.
